short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Regain control of your Chrome tab notifications and Twitch clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Suppresses the StreamLabs notification bell, stopping it from being a distraction. Handy for live streamers (eg on Twitch) who find the notifications a bit too pushy and would prefer to look at them at their leisure. Also tweaks the copy-to-clipboard of Twitch chat, making it more chat-like.
